prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Synth Lead, Piano, Brass, Bass, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Piano, Brass, Bass, and a Synth Lead, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Synth Lead, Piano, Brass, and Bass, but no Guitar.

Style 3:
This song has Drums, Piano, Brass, Bass, and a Synth Lead, omitting the Guitar.
